message.body: Thx 4 the family reiki! Paz has been having quite a time with bottlefeeding! Poor charlie...
Aw. I sent some for Luci to arrive at 4pm today too!!!
Good! Some pus from an old ear infection causing temp hearing loss.should resolve on its own soon. Xoxo
Ah! That sounds a little ouchy but is wonderful news!!! Getting ready to go to Laura!!!!!!!!!!!!
Starting Ryan's treatment soon. I'm wearing a shirt like the lovely white one you always let me borrow so that you can be here too. Love, Monica
Hope it goes well and glad i can be there in spirit. Xoxoxo
